channel.title: Godot on Ahisahar Pretel Rodríguez
channel.description: Recent content in Godot on Ahisahar Pretel Rodríguez

item.title: Granada Game Jam
item.description:
I have always loved games. I enjoy playing games but I haven’t made one and wanted to create some content and share it with the community. So we arranged a four people team and decided to use Godot engine (an open source game engine). After the brainstorm, we decided to make a survival-type in a undiscovered world where some insects spawn and try to kill you. Feel free to play the game and contribute!

https://github.com/jesusgn90/game-jam-granada-2017
